column1: Uchi////I was expecting this place to be good
column2: but not great due to the hype; however
column3: it was as good as everyone described. The food was fantastic
column5: beautifully presented. The service was good
column6: but not stellar. Our group of 5 was seated just after 5:30pm and left around 8:30pm. There were a few lags in serving of dishes
column7: but each new one that came out left us wanting more. Try as much as you can
column8: then come again and try some more.
